alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 23 at 2:20PM EST until December 23 at 2:45PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... New London County in southern Connecticut... Northern Middlesex County in southern Connecticut... * Until 245 PM EST. * At 218 PM EST, showers with isolated thunderstorms producing damaging winds were located along a line extending from near Hebron to near Fishers Island, moving north at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, New London, Colchester, East Hampton, Groton, Old Saybrook, Salem, Chester, Mystic, Waterford, East Lyme, Ledyard, Griswold and East Haddam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
